SELECT A.EMP_CD , A.EMP_ID , A.EMP_PW , A.EMP_NM , A.EMP_EML , A.POST , A.ADDR , A.DET_ADDR , A.EMP_TEL , A.EMP_SIGN_DT , A.POSI_CD , A.FAIL_CNT , A.EMP_SIT_CD , A.APPR_SIGN_PATH , A.PROFILE , A.ENABLED , A.DEP_CD , B.YEAR_CNT
, C.AUTH_CD FROM EMPLOYEE A, VACATION B, AUTH C WHERE A.EMP_CD = B.EMP_CD(+) AND A.EMP_CD = C.EMP_CD AND A.EMP_CD = #{empCd}
SELECT AFF_DT , EMP_CD , AFF_ATT FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE AFF_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND EMP_CD = #{empCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE ( REG_DT , AFF_ATT , AFF_DT , EMP_CD , WORK_SIT_CD ) VALUES ( SYSDATE , TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'HH24:MI:SS') , TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYY-MM-DD') , #{empCd} , 'T00' )
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET NON_ATT = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'HH24:Mi:SS') , WORK_SIT_CD = CASE WHEN (SELECT TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'HH24:Mi:SS'),1,2)) - (SELECT SUBSTR(AFF_ATT,1,2) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE AFF_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND EMP_CD = #{empCd}) AS TIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE AFF_DT = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM DUAL) AND EMP_CD = #{empCd}) > 8 THEN 'T00' WHEN (SELECT SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS'),1,2) AS TIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE AFF_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND EMP_CD = #{empCd}) < 16 THEN 'T01' ELSE 'T02' END WHERE AFF_DT = (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM DUAL) AND EMP_CD = #{empCd}
mapper.select: SELECT REG_DT , AFF_ATT , AFF_DT , NON_ATT , (SELECT COMM_CD_NM FROM COMMON B WHERE A.WORK_SIT_CD = B.COMM_CD) AS WORK_SIT_CD FROM ATTENDANCE A WHERE EMP_CD = #{empCd}

SELECT DISTINCT(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(VAC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') + (LEVEL-1), 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS AFF_DT , A.VAC_DIV_CD AS WORK_SIT_CD , A.USE_CNT , A.VAC_DT AS NON_ATT FROM VAC_USE A, APPROVAL B WHERE A.APPR_NO = B.APPR_NO AND B.EMP_CD = #{empCd} AND B.APPR_SIT_CD = 'A02' CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(VAC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')+A.USE_CNT) - TO_DATE(VAC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT ROWNUM AS ID , B.EMP_NM||' '||(SELECT COMM_CD_NM FROM COMMON B WHERE A.WORK_SIT_CD = B.COMM_CD) AS TITLE , A.AFF_DT||'T'||A.AFF_ATT AS "START" , A.AFF_DT||'T'||A.NON_ATT AS "END" FROM EMPLOYEE B, ATTENDANCE A WHERE A.EMP_CD = B.EMP_CD(+) AND B.DEP_CD = #{depCd} AND SUBSTR(POSI_CD,2) < (SELECT SUBSTR(POSI_CD,2) FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_CD = #{empCd})

SELECT TO_DATE(VAC_DT) AS VAC_DT , A.USE_CNT FROM VAC_USE A, APPROVAL B WHERE A.APPR_NO = B.APPR_NO AND B.EMP_CD = #{empCd} AND B.APPR_SIT_CD = 'A02' AND TO_DATE(VAC_DT) BETWEEN (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')||'01','YYYYMM') FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')||'12'||'31','YYYYMMDD') FROM DUAL)

SELECT (AFF_DT||' '||AFF_ATT) AFF_ATT , (AFF_DT||' '||NON_ATT) NON_ATT , EMP_CD FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_CD = #{empCd} AND NON_ATT IS NOT NULL AND REG_DT BETWEEN (SELECT TRUNC(sysdate, 'iw') FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT TRUNC(sysdate,'iw')+5 FROM DUAL)

SELECT (AFF_DT||' '||AFF_ATT) AFF_ATT , (AFF_DT||' '||NON_ATT) NON_ATT , EMP_CD FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_CD = #{empCd} AND NON_ATT IS NOT NULL AND REG_DT BETWEEN (SELECT TRUNC(sysdate,'MM') FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT LAST_DAY(sysdate) FROM DUAL)
